Package peer

Interface Manager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentManager
    public interface Manager
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the remote functions available for a Manager, which controls contents in a node

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String get_filename​(java.lang.String hash, java.util.List<java.lang.String> names)
      Get the filename a file is saved with in the seeder
      Content get_information​(java.lang.String hash)
      Return the descriptions and tags of a content
      ByteSlice get_slice​(java.lang.String hash, java.lang.Integer slice)
      Given a hash, return the Content with a file_data, called remotely
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHashesNeeded​(java.lang.String hash)
      Used to ask the manager for hashes, used when the file is too big
      java.lang.Integer getSlicesNeeded​(java.lang.String hash)
      Return the number of 1 MB slices needed to download a file
